scheduleInfo.helpOnTimezone: Joda time DateTimeZone.getAvailableIDs() will return the full list. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones has a decent set too.
scheduleInfo.helpOnCronExpression: Use http://www.cronmaker.com/ to generate a cronExpression. We may build the UI for this in the future.

group-name: Bootsrapper smb channel- laucher for all other channels..
